Main Page | Modules | Class Hierarchy | Alphabetical List | Data Structures | File List | Data Fields | Examples

operations with warea collections
[area for approximation (warea)]


Functions

bool surfit::wareas_delall ()
 removes all wareas from surfit_wareas collection
bool surfit::wareas_del (int pos)
 removes warea from surfit_wareas collection at 'pos' position
bool surfit::wareas_read (const char *filename, const char *wareaname, REAL value, REAL weight, int columns=2, int col1=1, int col2=2, const char *delimiter=" ", int grow_by=250)
 reads warea from formatted text file and adds it to surfit_wareas collection
bool surfit::wareas_load (const char *filename, const char *wareaname=NULL)
 reads warea from ROFF file (see datafile for details) and adds it to surfit_wareas collection
warea * surfit::wareas_at (int pos)
 returns warea at 'pos' position in surfit_wareas collection
warea * surfit::wareas_first ()
 returns first warea in surfit_wareas collection
warea * surfit::wareas_last ()
 returns last warea in surfit_wareas collection
int surfit::wareas_size ()
 returns amount of elements in surfit_wareas collection
int surfit::wareas_info ()
 prints information about all wareas in surfit_wareas collection
